metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
The dump_callback function in SQLite 3.20.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (EXC_BAD_ACCESS and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-0 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
sqlite3 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> crash in command line program only

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2').
